name: Ghost Blade

awakening_skills.name: Soul Heaven Slash
awakening_skills.description: DMG dealt will not trigger DMG reflection.

awakening_skills.name: Mysterious Slash
awakening_skills.description: The chance to trigger mysterious power increases by 30%.

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle).

introduction: Under the blue sky, there was a young girl practicing swordsmanship, sometimes absent-minded, and sometimes arrogant. Waving a few slashes towards the sky, split the confusion in happiness, but the girl's confusion is more than these.
